posts.post_title: Moved to the bay  T206 Crawford ghost and Hindu Revelle l
posts.post_content:
Hey all,
I’ve been able to put a couple cards in the HOF backs line so need to pass along some duplicate players to pay the bill
Payment net to me, I cover shipping. PayPal, Zelle or good old folding money.
PM or email (  [url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url] ).

Always looking for a T206 tough backed HOFers to fill out my line and a Red Cobb, any back that’s a good looking VG. Hindu Shag is on my list too!

Looking for an off backed HR Baker in VG or VGEX!!

Dutch Revelle Hindu SGC 1 
Crawford Ghost raw 

Chance Old Mill PSA 2                      Traded
